caption.p: ( A) Spike proteins on the surface of the coronavirus bind to angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE-2) receptors on the surface of the target cell; ( B) The type II transmembrane serine protease (TMPRSS2) binds to and cleaves the ACE-2 receptor. In the process, the spike protein is activated; ( C) Cleaved ACE-2 and activated spike protein facilitate viral entry. TMPRSS2 expression increases cellular uptake of the coronavirus [ 20, 21, 22].
